fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A picture of the businessman and anti-corruption campaigner Bill Browder was captioned as being of the late whistleblower Sergei Magnitsky, a Russian lawyer who in 2008 helped Browder uncover tax fraud (Russian elite must be forced to explain their wealth, MPs say, 17 March, page 12). • Other recently corrected articles include: Ilford M&S to help build pop-up hostel for local rough sleepers Romy’s Kitchen, Thornbury, Bristol: ‘Not too hip, not too laboured, but welcoming’ – restaurant review What is Cambridge Analytica? The firm at the centre of Facebook’s data breach
